Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its high-quality features and unique benefits, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. We're offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $14,000, which we believe is a fair and competitive offer considering its worth to you is $12,000. We're confident you'll find the investment worthwhile. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
